scripts.deploy-protocol: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-protocol && npm run contract:generate-protocol && npm run contract:push-protocol
scripts.deploy-training: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-training && npm run contract:generate-training && npm run contract:push-training
scripts.deploy-model: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-training && npm run contract:generate-training && npm run contract:push-training
scripts.deploy-evaluation: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-evaluation && npm run contract:generate-evaluation && npm run contract:push-evaluation
scripts.deploy-token: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-protocol && npm run contract:generate-protocol && npm run contract:push-protocol
scripts.deploy-all:individual: npm run deploy-protocol && npm run deploy-training && npm run deploy-evaluation && npm run deploy-token && npm run deploy-token
scripts.deploy-evaluation:no-push: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-evaluation && npm run contract:generate-evaluation
scripts.deploy-training:no-push: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-training && npm run contract:generate-training
scripts.deploy-protocol:no-push: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-protocol && npm run contract:generate-protocol
scripts.deploy-token:no-push: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-token && npm run contract:generate-token
scripts.deploy-model:no-push: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile-model && npm run contract:generate-model
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-evaluation:no-push && npm run deploy-training:no-push && npm run deploy-model:no-push && npm run deploy-token:no-push && npm run deploy-protocol:no-push && go run scripts/deploy.go --contract all
scripts.network: concurrently "npm run peer:requestor" "npm run peer:trainer" "npm run celestial"
scripts.simulation: go run simulation/setup/environment.go && go run main.go --utils simulation
scripts.migrate:peer-requestor: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction up --peerType requestor
scripts.migrate:peer-requestor:down: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction down --peerType requestor
scripts.migrate:peer-trainer: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction up --peerType trainer
scripts.migrate:peer-trainer:down: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction down --peerType trainer
scripts.peer:requestor: npm run migrate:peer-requestor && go run main.go --type peer --peerType requestor --extAddress :5002
scripts.peer:trainer: npm run migrate:peer-trainer && go run main.go --type peer --peerType trainer --extAddress :6001
scripts.celestial: npm run migrate:celestial && go run main.go --type celestial
